alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:41AM CST until January 28 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Sucarnoochee River At Livingston affecting Sumter County. .Flooding continues on the Sucarnoochee River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening.late tonight at 1245 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sucarnoochee River at Livingston. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands around Livingston occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning to a crest of 18.5 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
